plot: Jagjeet, a Sikh man, is filled with guilt that he got scared and did not save his childhood friend during the 1984 Sikh massacre in Delhi, India. Now haunted by this feeling, he finds difficult to live with everyday mundane life.
title: Jagjeet
plot_es: Jagjeet, a Sikh man, is filled with guilt that he got scared and did not save his childhood friend during the 1984 Sikh massacre in Delhi, India. Now haunted by this feeling, he finds difficult to live with everyday mundane life.
plot_en: Jagjeet, a Sikh man, is filled with guilt that he got scared and did not save his childhood friend during the 1984 Sikh massacre in Delhi, India. Now haunted by this feeling, he finds difficult to live with everyday mundane life.
